data.title: Stella Maris Church Kalmady – Shrine of Vailankanni
data.text:
Welcome to Vailankanni Shrine , Kalmady

Stella Maris Church devoted to Our Lady of Vailankanni attracts thousands of pilgrims from around the world. Larger visiting devotees and parishioners have recorded testimonies of miracles and special favours by Our Lady of Vailankanni.We have strong witnesses that there have been miracles taking place in this place. Large devotees without any cast and religion visit this place every day and seek God’s blessings.

Inspired by the Noah’s Ark, Stella Maris Church in Kalmady, Udupi is built in the shape of a boat and also has a bell tower in the shape of a lighthouse.

IN KARNATAKA

Stella Maris Parish News

Title of the document Saturday evening 4:00pm mass has been cancelled and half day retreat has been introduced from January 2023. There will be a half day retreat every saturday which includes preaching , adoration and mass followed by Lunch

How to Reach?

On the way to Malpe Beach this beautiful architectural master piece is built .From Udupi bus stand catch a bus to Malpe,(every 5 min you get a bus) From Kundapur , Get down at Karavali Junction and catch bus to Malpe.
